outline:
1. to honour, adorn, glorify, be high
    1. (Qal)
      1. to swell
        1. swelling (pass participle)
      2. to honour, pay honour to, show partiality
      3. to adorn
        1. adorned (pass participle)
      4. (Niphal) to be honoured
      5. (Hithpael) to honour oneself, claim honour
kjv_def: countenance, crooked place, glorious, honour, put forth.
strongs_def: to swell up (literally or figuratively, active or passive); by implication, to favor or honour, be high or proud
